## Usage
Get in-line suggestions from Hoogle’s search results via the `hoogle` keyword ([configurable](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/user-configuration/)). Press <kbd>↩</kbd> to open the search results page in the default web browser.
![Hoogle in-line results](images/about/hoogle-search-results.png)
Set your keyword via the "Configure workflow..." button.
